Awesome Game.description: This is a game inspired by Mario, intended for me to learn how to program a game.

Useful Budget Program.short description: A budgetting app made with React
Useful Budget Program.description: This app was intended for me to learn React, and the languages it uses, and to have some value, so that it feels rewarding to work towards it.

Cool App.short description: A boardgame app, made with Next
Cool App.description: This app was intended for me to learn Next, and more about the languages it entails. The boardgame app is to help the boardgame club maintain a list of its boardgames.
